item.title: Basics
item.description: Chapter 1 Basics Discover what this Hugo theme is all about and the core-concepts behind it.

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: Chapter 3 Shortcodes Hugo uses Markdown for its simple content format. However, there are a lot of things that Markdown doesnâ€™t support well. You could use pure HTML to expand possibilities. But this happens to be a bad idea. Everyone uses Markdown because it’s pure and simple to read even non-rendered. You should avoid HTML to keep it as simple as possible. To avoid this limitations, Hugo created shortcodes. A shortcode is a simple snippet inside a page.
